FormatText.string:
On [skill]Action Skill Used[/skill], Amara gains her [skill]Max Rush Stack[/skill] count, but they decay over time. Amara gains 3% [skill]Weapon Damage[/skill] and 10% [skill]Action Skill Cooldown Rate[/skill] based on the number of [skill]Rush Stacks[/skill].
Max Rush Stacks: [skill]$VALUE$[/skill]
